data.title: Horam Networking • Hailsham Chamber Of Commerce
data.meta_description: Horam networking at Hailsham & District Chamber of Commerce, a vibrant community of business owners based in Hailsham district.
data.text:
Who We Are

Welcome to Hailsham & District Chamber of Commerce, a vibrant and diverse community of professionals and business owners based in Hailsham and the surrounding district.

Our group is dedicated to fostering connections, sharing knowledge, and supporting local businesses in Horam and surrounding towns.

Whether you’re a seasoned entrepreneur or just starting, we provide a welcoming environment to help you grow your business.

Membership Benefits

Your Hailsham Chambers Membership enables you to; network with local organisations and other Members, grow contacts and develop mutually rewarding friendships.

Through our regular meetings, we discuss key issues and concerns and decide on supportive action.

We occasionally have guest speakers in attendance and maintain strong links with Wealden District Council, Hailsham Town Council, Hailsham Forward, Hailsham Community Safety Action Group and the Hailsham Town Council Youth Project.

Hailsham Chamber offers a range of effective marketing opportunities that allow you to promote your business through the Hailsham Chambers website and e-newsletter including news releases and advertising, as well as sponsorship of events.

Meet businesses from around Hailsham & District, from local towns like Heathfield, Horam, Polegate and Eastbourne.
